description.value:
Aura 2

All creatures other than the dragon treat the area within the aura as difficult terrain. The dragon loses this aura while airborne.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Poison

Standard

Reach 4

+32 vs AC; 1d12+10 damage. plus ongoing 25 poison damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+32 vs AC; 1d10+10 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks

Recharge 5-6

Standard

The dragon flies up to 14 squares and makes a bite attack at any point during the move without provoking an opportunity attack from the target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction, If An Adjacent Enemy Does Not Move On Its Turn, At-Will

+32 vs Reflex; 2d12+10 damage, and the target is knocked prone.

At-Will ✦ Charm, Gaze

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Range 10; +30 vs Will; the target slides 4 squares.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Charm, Psychic

Standard

Range 20; only affects a target taking ongoing poison damage; +30 vs Will; the target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls, ability checks, and skill checks (save ends). First Failed Save: The target is also dazed (save ends). Second Failed Save: The target cannot act to harm the dragon and no longer makes saving throws against this power's effects; at this point, only the death of the dragon or a remove affliction ritual can end the power's effects.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Poison

Standard

Close blast 5

+30 vs Fortitude; 3d10+8 poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 15 poison damage and is slowed (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Poison

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

At-Will ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +30 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

system.biography:
HP 1250; Bloodied 625
Resist 30 poison 		Init +23 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 43Fort 39Ref 41Will 39
Speed 10, fly 14 (hover), overland flight 18
Ability ScoresStr 24 (+20)
Con 26 (+21)		Dex 30 (+23)
Int 18 (+17)		Wis 18 (+17)
Cha 26 (+21)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Bluff +31, Diplomacy +26, Insight +27, Intimidate +26Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 27 | Insight 37
